stepItems.title: Amend delivery text
stepItems.description:
1C: Amend text under 'Availability' and 'Delivery' on the PRODUCT page of mirrors to match MD, for the 4 different shipping options, which are tagged - free1, free2, pre1 and pre2. The text details can be taken straight from MD and I've added the 4 tags on ND. The delivery info text needs to be followed through for each of the 4 tags/shipping options, on the CART page - replicate from MD. This is only for mirror products on NetDeco

2B: Text under 'Availability' and 'Delivery' on the PRODUCT page of non-mirrors needs to be updated. This is only for non-mirror products on NetDeco The tag is - pre3 - and the text is:

Availability
Currently awaiting stock.
Order today for delivery in 2-4 weeks

Delivery
£4.99 Delivery to UK Mainland, 2-4 weeks
£15 Delivery to Scottish Highlands, Northern Ireland & Off-shore Islands, 3-5 weeks

2C: The delivery info text needs to follow through onto CART page - DELIVERY 2-4 WEEKS This is only for non-mirror products on NetDeco

stepItems.title: Copyright notice
stepItems.description: 1D: change the copyright in the footer to 2016

stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

title: NetDeco delivery text changes + copyright 2016
description:
1C: Amend text under 'Availability' and 'Delivery' on the PRODUCT page of mirrors to match MD, for the 4 different shipping options, which are tagged - free1, free2, pre1 and pre2. The text details can be taken straight from MD and I've added the 4 tags on ND. The delivery info text needs to be followed through for each of the 4 tags/shipping options, on the CART page - replicate from MD. This is only for mirror products on NetDeco

2B: Text under 'Availability' and 'Delivery' on the PRODUCT page of non-mirrors needs to be updated. This is only for non-mirror products on NetDeco The tag is - pre3 - and the text is:

Order today for delivery in 2-4 weeks
